name: Humanity's final suprise
description:
You are a policeman sent to investigate the property of Hawk 9. A top secret government laboratory which's secrets can destroy the world.

How will you unfold the story in Humanity's final surprise?

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D - move
left mouse button - interact
right mouse button - flare
shift - sprint
t - pause

This game was made for the Yogscast 2020 game jam in under 48 hours. Hope you enjoy this short experience and thanks for playing :3
